page.title: 16STRETTON WALKING COUNTRY
page.content: Church Stretton is a good place for walking in the country, especially for hill walking. Here are some of the names of the hills to walk on: Hope Bowlder Hill, Ragleth Hill and Hazler Hill. On the hills there are sheep that graze and ponies who lie in the sun. Rectory Wood has a field to walk in and in the winter you can go skiing and sledging. The land cover to walk on is quite rough. Hopes Wood is where a lot of people go walking. The woods and hills are the most popular aspects of Church Stretton . Many tourists come to Church Stretton to go walking.
